captions.text:
Lay your head on this Hylian Shield pillow
and go to Kirby's Dream Land...pullover sweater.

I'm Jake and this is episode #23 of Game LUT.
Pick up your Final Fantasy Gunblade Mugfrom

your Pac-Man themed coffee table...that's
made entirely out of VHS tapes and grab one

of these awesome The Last of Us shirts from
the design contest on welovefine.com. Wear

it with an N7 varsity jacket and scope out
your next adventure with this dragon ball

z hat that comes equipped with built in scouter.
You'll look great, I'm just saiyan.

Then get protection with a Portal Sentry Turret
that you can design yourself, so you can take

time to look at these video game prints by
Etall.

If you're going out put on a League of Legends
Tresh Scythe and Lantern Necklace, a Skyrim

Dark Brotherhood Hoodie and Spider-Man Heart
leggings. If you don't want to marvel at those

leggings, try DC Super-Heroine ones instead.
For something Onix-pected there's this Pokemon

swimsuit. And to get to the pool faster use
your 3D Printed Portal Gun that you can store

in a stylish batman makeup bag.
If things get too hot get a Silicon Power

Mitt Oven glove, sit inside and play on one
of these rad custom game boy advances and

there are even awesome custom consoles.
But if you want to build your own handheld

there is Gamebuino, a project currently on
indiegogo. It's an arduino based mini game

console for playing 8bit games. You can try
what other people have crafted or completely

create your own games.
See if you can program Minecraft onto it or

just collect these Minecraft hangers. You
don't get a choice of which one you want so

you never know what you'll ender up with.
Keep that crafting spirit alive with these

amazing digital papercraft art prints by Steph
Caskenette...

Drink faster than your friends with these
sonic pint glasses and protect the counter

and the world with handmade metal superhero
coasters crafted by Apocalypse Fabrication

on etsy that include Iron Man, Green Lantern,
and Captain America. After all that drinking

go to the restroom but watch, there's a sarlacc
in your toilet...decals.

Then put on your Marvel Comic Boots, a stained
glass Link tank top, grab your keys from this

Pokemon key holder that has built in key rings,
and blast off into the Kerbal space program

with one of these adorable 3D printed figurines
or planets from Shapeways.

Once you land back at the Kerbal Space Center,
join the Silent Hill Historical Society tshirt,

and spruce that place up with this incredible
Limited Edition Zelda Twilight Princess Figurine.

Don't be Forever a loan, subscribe to Vsauce3
for more Game LUT, unless you want a Dark

Knight...sleep mask.
Also, if you want to impress someone with

your baking ability I made some Lego Pinata
Cookies with my friend Ro over on Nerdy Nummies.

You can see my baking skills. So if you knead
to dough how to make some delicious treats,

check it out by clicking here or the link
at the top of the description. And, as always,
thanks for watching.

title: Awesome Custom Consoles and MORE!! -- Game LÜT #23
